name: Threatening Negotiator
text: Those who you intimidate know that you’ll go through with your threats.
benefit: When you successfully use the Intimidate skill to force an opponent to act friendly toward you, the duration of the attitude change lasts 2d6 hours.
normal: Changing an opponent’s attitude with Intimidate normally changes the foe’s attitude to friendly for 1d6×10 minutes.
text_zh: 那些被你恐吓的人心里明白，你是个说到做到的人。
prerequisites_zh: 冷面交涉人，谈判专家，技能专攻（威吓）。
benefit_zh: 当你成功使用威吓技能迫使1名对手对你表示友善（act friendly toward you），目标态度的改变会持续2d6小时。
normal_zh: 使用威吓改变对手的态度后，它对你的友好态度只会在1d6 x 10分钟。
